item.title: Avowed - My Loyal Shield Treasure Map Location
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/avowed-my-loyal-shield-treasure-map-location/1100-6529602/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Avowed in filled with treasure maps that can lead you to unique and powerful loot, if you can the location shown on the map. In Galawain's Tusks you can acquire the My Loyal Shield treasure map by purchasing it from Eberk at the Southern Warden Tower, located in the western part of The Sallow Steppe. With the treasure map in hand, you can set out to find the loot in Galawain's Tusks.

Where to find My Loyal Shield treasure

The My Loyal Shield treasure can be found in a small set of ruins in the far western part of Twinedwood, south of the Outcast Tower Camp. The ruins are right next to the lava river. To climb up to them, start from the south and wrap around the western side of the building.

Once up in the ruins, there is a table in the center of the room, with a switch on the side of it. Hit the switch to open a door, which can be found by following the power cord. Head inside the door to reach the lower floor of the ruins, where a chest containing the Time's Tarnish, a legendary quality shield, can be found.

Time's Tarnish offers the Timeless Aegis passive, where blocking has a 20% chance to refill 20 stamina, and the Dull the Edge, Blunt the Point passive, which offers a 10% to avoid any incoming melee damage. You can upgrade one of these abilities at the enchantment station in the party camp.

Obsidian is no stranger to crafting compelling RPGs. For more help on the team's latest effort, use our Avowed guides hub.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

item.title: Avowed - Ancient Arrowhead Treasure Map Location
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/avowed-ancient-arrowhead-treasure-map-location/1100-6529603/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Treasure maps in Avowed provide you with an image to try and track down some unique loot, somewhere in each region. In Galawain's Tusks, you can acquire the Ancient Arrowhead treasure map, found in the Writhing Ruins in the southern part of the map, in the same area that the Mater Mare bounty target can be found, looted from a skeleton in the bounty boss arena. With the treasure map, you can set out to find the hidden loot. Note: You will need three lock picks to open the chest with the treasure.

Where to find the Ancient Arrowhead treasure

The Ancient Arrowhead treasure can be found in a locked chest on a ledge east of Warden's Rest in the Salt Flat Farms area. In this area there is a cave leading down, but the treasure is not down there. You need to climb around the ledge here while staying on top of the cliff. If you start from the northern area, it's pretty easy to wrap around the rocks to find the chest.

The chest contains the Scout's Reach, which will complete the quest once collected. This trinket gives you +3 perception when worn. Trinkets cannot be upgraded or improved via enchantment, so if you don't want that bonus, you can sell it for 600 gold, or throw it in your stash to maybe use later. The chest also includes various upgrade materials, as well.

Obsidian is no stranger to crafting compelling RPGs. For more help on the team's latest effort, use our Avowed guides hub.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

item.title: Avowed - Robe Of The Arcane Cheater Treasure Map Location
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/avowed-robe-of-the-arcane-cheater-treasure-map-location/1100-6529598/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Throughout Avowed you can find treasure maps, which will lead you to unique gear, if you can decipher the location shown on the map. In Shatterscarp, you can obtain the Robe of the Arcane Cheater treasure map from Ihaka, a merchant located in the far east part of Deadfall Highlands, just west of Tago's Tower and the Tago's Tower Beacon fast travel point. With the treasure map in hand, you can track down the related treasure to complete the quest.

Where to find the Robe of the Arcane Cheater treasure

Head to the Ancient Lakebed and go to the lake on the map just south of the words Ancient Lakebed. Approach the lake from the cliff to the east, and drop down where there is a ton of coral growing on the side of the rocks there. There is a small cave located here if you don't drop all the way down into the lake bed. Inside the cave there is a chest, which contains the Robes of Surpassing Brilliance.

The Robes of the Surpassing Brilliance are a unique set of armor of legendary quality, the highest possible quality in Avowed. The light armor offers two passive abilities, primarily focused on improving spell casting. The first is Overseeing, which offers 15% increased area of effect damage, with the second being Innate Talent giving 40 maximum essence. One of these unique abilities can be upgraded at camp or you can scrap the armor for high quality upgrade materials.

Obsidian is no stranger to crafting compelling RPGs. For more help on the team's latest effort, use our Avowed guides hub.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

item.title: Avowed - Dead Man's Mail Treasure Map Location
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/avowed-dead-mans-mail-treasure-map-location/1100-6529597/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

In Avowed you can find three treasure maps in each region, leading you to unique loot if you can find the location shown. In Shatterscarp, you can find the Dead Man's Mail treasure map in the Great Sand Sea, in a small camp directly underneath the "S" in Sea on the map. One of the tents in camp is open, with a skeleton inside. Loot the skeleton to find the treasure map, which will lead you further north from there. Note: You will need three lock picks to open the chest containing the treasure.

Where to find the Dead Man's Mail treasure

With the map in hand, travel to Tago's Tower Beacon fast travel point in Shark's Teeth. Head to the ruins to the north, where you will find a fallen pillar leading up onto the ruins. Head to the eastern part of the ruins to find a small campsite, with a treasure chest up against the ruins. Use the lock picks to open the chest and collect the Necropants inside, marking the quest as completed.

The Necropants are a unique piece of armor at Legendary quality, the highest possible in Avowed. It has two unique passives, one of which can be upgraded in camp at the enchantment table. First is Spectral Slave, which summons a Spectre to fight alongside you. The second is the Poison-Proofed passive, which provides 30% resistance to poison build-up. The Necropants can also be scrapped for materials, if you don't want the armor.

Obsidian is no stranger to crafting compelling RPGs. For more help on the team's latest effort, use our Avowed guides hub.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

item.title: Avowed - Seafarer's Boots Treasure Map Location
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/avowed-seafarers-boots-treasure-map-location/1100-6529596/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

In Avowed you can find treasure maps in each of the main regions, which lead you to unique gear, if you can find the treasure. In Shatterscarp, the third region, you can find the Seafarer's Boots treasure map at a picnic blanket just east of Thirdborn's entrance. With the map in hand, you can track down a unique set of boots.

Where to find the Seafarer's Boots map

The map can be found on a picnic blanket, just east of Thirdborn's entrance. The picnic is set up at a lower elevation than Thirdborn, overlooking desert dunes.

Where to find the Seafarer's Boots

The Seafarer's Boots treasure can be found near the Sulfur Mines Basecamp. Just east of there is a river, primarily running north to south, but there is a small off-shoot heading east. Follow that river to its end to find a small cave with a body inside. Among the loot on the corpse are the Wavebinder Boots. Across from the boots, you can find another cave, which can be opened using fire, and the chest can be accessed after using Yatzli's disillusion spell, but this loot is unrelated to the treasure map.

The Wavefinder Boots offer two passive bonuses. The first is +15 maximum essence, with the second being Sure Footing, which reduces movement when taking a hit. Boots cannot be upgraded in any way, so these passives cannot be changed. Once you collect the boots, the quest will be marked as complete. If you have no use for these boots, they can be sold for 750 gold.

Obsidian is no stranger to crafting compelling RPGs. For more help on the team's latest effort, use our Avowed guides hub.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

item.title: New PC Game Sale Includes Hundreds Of AAA Hits For Low Prices
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/new-pc-game-sale-includes-hundreds-of-aaa-hits-for-low-prices/1100-6529594/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Fanatical launched a new Gaming Legends Sale today, bringing huge discounts to hundreds of PC games, with some as much as 90% off. The deals include big AAA titles, popular indies, and preorders on upcoming new releases. As a bonus, all orders of $15 or more get a bonus game or coupon code.

Some notable discounts in the sale include the acclaimed third-person shooter Control Ultimate Edition for $7.19 (was $40), fan-favorite soulslike action RPG Lies of P for $26 (was $60), and the cyberpunk immersive sim System Shock Remake for $16 (was $40). You can also pick up the popular post-apocalyptic city builder Frostpunk for $3.44 (was $30) and its recent sequel Frostpunk 2 for $27 (was $45)

As is often the case with Fanatical's recent sales, Capcom, Sega, and Bethesda are discounting large portions of their catalogs during the Gaming Legends Sale. This includes some of the biggest titles from each publisher, including Skyrim Anniversary Edition for $11.49 (was $50), Dragon's Dogma 2 for $36.39 (was $70), and Metaphor: Refantazio for $61 (was $70).

Preorders for upcoming games from these publishers like Monster Hunter Wilds, Doom: The Dark Ages, and Lika A Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii. Other notable preorder discounts include Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, Elden Ring: Nightreign, Suikodon 1&2 HD Remaster, Capcom Fighting Collection 2, and Shinobi: Art of Vengeance. Check the list below for a selection of our favorite deals in Fanatical's Gaming Legends sale.

Along with these individual game and preorder deals, Fanatical's numerous bundle deals are also eligible for the bonus game or coupon code offer on orders of $15 or more. This includes the recent Bundlefest bundles like the Build Your Own Capcom Bundle, the latest Prestige Collection, and even non-gaming deals like the Vampire Hunter D Complete Series book bundle.

Disclosure: GameSpot and Fanatical are both owned by Fandom.

item.title: Avowed - Full Emerald Stair Map And Points Of Interest
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/avowed-full-emerald-stair-map-and-points-of-interest/1100-6529569/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

After the story events unravel in Dawnshore, you'll make your way to the Emerald Stair map in Avowed. The ambassador has heard that the Dreamscourge has started to take over the region and he wants you to investigate what's going on in the main city of Fior mes Iverno. You're able to travel to Emerald Stair through a gate and arrive to a map that's fully covered with fog, exactly how Dawnshore was when you firs started the game.

While it's exciting to uncover a new map, it can also be a little overwhelming, as you're not sure where to go. Fortunately, we took the time to completely uncover Emerald Stair's map so you know everything it has to offer in Avowed.

Full Emerald Stair Map in Avowed

Compared to Dawnshore, Emerald Stair is a much more open map that's not as full of buildings and dedicated roads to follow. While there are still roads and plenty of locations to visit, you'll find more room to roam in the animancer paradise. Emerald Stair has a total of six large regions, including Fior mes Iverno, and they are as follows:

  • Fior mes Iverno
  • Maxim's Claim
  • Rolling Crags
  • The Wildwoods
  • The Delemgan Glade
  • Grim Wetlands

You'll find a majority of the map's distinct regions in the bottom half of the map, but there are still sights to see in the northern parts of the map as well. Below, you can see full images of the Emerald Stair fully uncovered in Avowed:

As you can see, Fior mes Iverno as a whole is covered. When you enter the hub city, you can bring up a dedicated map showcasing its unique shops and areas. Then, when you exit the city, you'll see the normal Emerald Stair map again.

Emerald Stair Key Points of Interest

While Emerald Stair isn't quite as large as Dawnshore, it still has plenty to offer. As always, there are treasure maps to find and follow as well as the Totem of Defiance pieces to gather. There's also a total of 15 fast travel beacons and nine Party Camps, so you have no shortage of ways to get around the map.

You can see a full accounting of other major points of interest in Emerald Stair below:

Strangled Adra

  • Directly to the north of Tama's Cabin and to the northeast The Delemgan Glade. You have to climb a small cliff to reach the Adra, which is sitting at the top of the cliff.

The Voice

  • The Voice's Memory is located right near the Ranger Outpost area just to the south of The Wildwoods. It's also near a fast travel beacon and not too difficult to reach.

Pargrun Cache

  • The Emerald Stair Pargrun Cache is located to the west of The Wildwoods and south of The Delemgan Glade. It's tucked away near the western edge of the map in the middle of a forest.

Treasure Maps

  • Earthy Aegis
  • Practical Pockets
  • Painter's Regret

Mapping the Living Lands Cartographer

  • Near the Naku Tedek Grounds in the south part of Emerald Stair (exact location in a separate guide)

And that wraps up all the major points of interest in Emerald Stair. It's arguably the most beautiful map in Avowed, so try and soak up the beauty as you're dodging mushrooms, delemgans, and other dangerous enemies.

Obsidian is no stranger to crafting compelling RPGs. For more help on the team's latest effort, use our Avowed guides hub.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

item.title: Avowed - Full Dawnshore Map And Points Of Interest
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/avowed-full-dawnshore-map-and-points-of-interest/1100-6529568/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Dawnshore is the first official map you can visit in Avowed. It's the home to Paradis, where you, as the official Aedryan envoy, need to meet with the ambassador to discuss the growing concern of the Dreamscourge. Of course, Dawnshore is home to much more than Paradis, and the fairly large map can be explored in its entirety as soon as you get off the boat at Claviger's Landing. While we recommend you complete some main story missions first, you'll eventually want to explore the majority of Dawnshore to see everything that Avowed has to offer in its opening hours.

We went through the trouble of uncovering all the necessary fog on the Dawnshore map so you know exactly where everything is located. Below, you can see the map completely uncovered along with some key points of interest.

Full Dawnshore Map in Avowed

If you think Paradis is big when you arrive in the city, you haven't seen anything yet. The map of Dawnshore is a gorgeous place full of secret caves, dangerously high vistas, and several different regions. In total, there are seven major regions including Paradis, and they are:

  • Paradis
  • Ondra's Reach
  • Ivona's Threshold
  • Fractured Shore
  • Southern Embrace
  • Overgrown Frontier
  • The Rise

To see everything Dawnshore has to offer, you want to visit all seven of these regions, where you'll find smaller areas that can be explored. Here are full images of the entire uncovered Dawnshore map:

The only covered part of the map is Paradis Hightown, which can't be uncovered on the map. Instead, you can visit that location directly and view a dedicated map that showcases all of its different areas.

Dawnshore Key Points of Interest

Dawnshore certainly has plenty to see and do, including going on a few different treasure map hunts and finding all the pieces to the Totem of Rightful Rulership.

In total, there are 11 fast travel beacons and four Party Camps in Dawnshore, giving you plenty of ways to get around the map quicker. If you want to find all the fast travel beacons, follow the red lines that become visible on the map as you uncover more fog. Those red lines represent the main road, and fast travel beacons mostly spawn along those lines.

Below, we'll list off some points of interest in Dawnshore and where you can find them so you can visit them quickly as you play:

Strangled Adra

  • Right behind the Emerald Stair Gatehouse on the far eastern side of Dawnshore

The Voice

  • On the edge of the Watcher's Mirror location, which is northeast of Paradis and facing the far eastern river

Pargrun Cache

  • For sweet rewards, head to the top of Dawnshore right above the Pilgrim's Path and Godless Ruins. There you'll find the Pargrun Cache, which requires some work to get into but has a chest full of unique rewards. Every map in Avowed has a Pargrun Cache.

Treasure Maps

  • Intimidating Feline Codpiece
  • Captain Henqua's Spoils
  • Woedica's Inheritance

Mapping the Living Lands Cartographer

  • Near the Usher's Hand area to the east of Paradis (exact location in a separate guide)

That just about does it for all the main points of interest on the Dawnshore map in Avowed. There are, of course, plenty of additional locations you can visit for main story and side quests, so make sure you're partaking in as much content as possible to easily explore the map.

Obsidian is no stranger to crafting compelling RPGs. For more help on the team's latest effort, use our Avowed guides hub.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com
